name: Chaos Arena
overview: Welcome to Chaos Arena! Pit yourself against seasoned warriors in the most frantic duel to date! Every warrior looks the same, so your first challenge is to figure out who's who. The only way to defeat others is to push them out of arena with your attacks, but beware - your fierceful strikes may also push you into abyss. Also, the arena constantly crumbles, so no hiding around! The last man standing wins.
